summary.existence\_uniqueness: For every Box B with full operator signature there exists a unique Ξ(B) and canonical morphism η\_B: B → Ξ(B).
summary.terminality: Ξ(B) is terminal among all meta-synthesis objects factoring the lower-tier operator diagram.
summary.normal\_form: Ξ-\>NF defines NF\_Ξ(E) as the unique normal form of any well-typed expression E over the full hierarchy.
